mapper.sql: id, open_id, state, type, title, content, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: select count(id) from invoice_info where open_id = #{openId}
mapper.insert: insert into invoice_info (open_id, state, type, title, content, created_at, updated_at) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into invoice_info
id,

title,

created_at,
updated_at,

open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
